description: Numbers n such that sigma(n) = sigma(n + 4).
references: J.-M. De Koninck, Ces nombres qui nous fascinent, Entry 51, p. 19, Ellipses, Paris 2008.
A. Weingartner, On the Solutions of sigma(n) = sigma(n+k), Journal of Integer Sequences, Vol. 14 (2011), #11.5.5.
links: Paolo P. Lava and Donovan Johnson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000 (first 130 terms from Paolo P. Lava)
maple: A015863:=proc(q) local n;for n from 1 to q do if sigma(n+4)=sigma(n) then print(n); fi; od; end:A015863 (10^10); # _Paolo P. Lava_, Mar 25 2013
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_
